title: 警視庁特犯課007 [Keishichou Tokuhanka 007], Volume 1
description: The “Special crime investigation department 007? includes the most capable and extraordinary investigators and Fuyuki, who also becomes one of its members, is very capable, to. And she is paired with Kuze, a cool and very bishonen detective. Their combination proves to be the most dangerous one the police headquarters had ever seen!Source: Aerandria Scans
author: Eiri Kazi
